FuncDef:
The span command sets a span to estimate the OSNR of a line. A span needs to be set based on the customer network situation.
The undo span command deletes the span configuration.
By default, the span is 1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a span value.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 50. The default value is 1.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When an optical amplifier (OA) resides between two connected OTN interfaces, run the span command to set a span based on the network situation, so that the non-linear OSNR of a line can be more accurately estimated to facilitate line adjustment.
